title: Bug 116564: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
OB: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
EB: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK', then reopen the hyperlink builder.
